unnormalised: Crop insurance, bhaiyya, is a must these days! Especially with unpredictable weather like in Maharashtra. Heard farmers in Vidarbha struggling after the 20/07/2023 floods. My uncle Ramlal in Haryana swears by Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana. Saved him in 2022 after the untimely rain on 10/03/2022 at 16:00 hrs. Though payouts can be slow. Rs. 20,000 is a small consolation for lost crops, right? Still better than nothing, especially with loans to pay back to the bank by 30/09/2024. Jai Kisan!
